review: It's really a great addition to any TV that is not a smart TV. I picked it up for my stupid TV when it was on sale to Prime Members for $19.99 and do not have a single regret. I can watch all the Amazon Prime and Netflix I want with my older television. I haven't really explored the other apps and games, but they also look pretty cool. The only thing I wasn't expecting was that it needed to be plugged into an outlet all the time, but that's really no big deal. I'd recommend the Fire TV Stick to anyone that wants to upgrade their stupid TV to a smart one!

review: I like almost everything about it. ALMOST. The interface is really simple and looks nice. It does what it's supposed to so I'm happy about that. However, it doesn't have HBO GO which would have been nice. Also, I don't know if it's just the one I received or if it's that way for everyone, but the remote is very finicky and doesn't work properly. It gets stuck or it moves at lightning speed even though I only pressed it once. If they fix the remote and add HBO GO, this would be a very competitive product!
